1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import os
3 import sys
4 import numpy as np
5 # ROS packages
6 import rospy
7 import rospkg
8 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
9 # Our packages
10 from stopwatch import StopWatch # noqa: E402
11 from storage import StaticPoseData, DynamicPoseData # noqa: E402
12 from hiro_ros_arm_controller.RobotController import PandaController # noqa: E402
13 ROS_ROBOTIC_SKIN_PATH = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
14 sys.path.append(os.path.join(ROS_ROBOTIC_SKIN_PATH, 'scripts'))
15 import utils # noqa: E402
16 
17 RATE = rospy.get_param('/dynamic_frequency')
18 SIM_DT = 1.0 / RATE
19 STATIC_MOTION_RECORD_TIME = 3.0
20 DYNAMIC_MOTION_RECORD_TIME = rospy.get_param('/oscillation_time')
21 FREQS = rospy.get_param('/oscillation_frequency')
22 AMPLITUDES = rospy.get_param('/oscillation_magnitude')
23 IS_SIM = rospy.get_param('/is_sim')
24 REST_TIME = rospy.get_param('/rest_time')
25 
26 
27 class DataCollector:
28  """
29  Class for collecting dynamic pose data and save them as a pickle file
30  """
31  def __init__(self, controller, poses_list, is_sim=True,
32  savedir='data',
33  static_filename='static_data.pickle',
34  dynamic_filename='dynamic_data.pickle',
35  ):
36  """
37  Initializes DataCollector class.
38 
39  Arguments
40  -----------
41  controller:
42  Wrapped controller to control either a robot.
43  poses_list: list
44  A list of poses. Each pose is a list.
45  It includes 7 joint position, 7 joint velociites, and Pose name
46  filepath: str
47  File path to save the collected data
48  """
49  self.controller = controller
50  self.poses_list = poses_list
51  self.is_sim = is_sim
52  # constant
53  self.pose_names = [pose[2] for pose in poses_list]
54  self.joint_names = map(str, self.controller.joint_names)
55 
56  # get imu names and topics through rostopic and xacro.
57  self.imu_names, self.imu_topics = utils.get_imu_names_and_topics()
58 
59  self.curr_pose_name = self.pose_names[0]
60  self.curr_joint_name = self.joint_names[0]
61  self.prev_angular_velocity = 0.0
62 
63  self.watch_dt = StopWatch()
64  self.watch_dynamic_motion = StopWatch()
65  self.watch_static_motion = StopWatch()
66 
67  self.r = rospy.Rate(RATE)
68  self.sim_dt = 1.0/RATE
69 
70  # data storage
71  static_filename = os.path.join(savedir, static_filename)
72  dynamic_filename = os.path.join(savedir, dynamic_filename)
73  self.static_acceleration_storage = StaticPoseData(self.pose_names, self.imu_names, static_filename)
74  self.dynamic_acceleration_storage = DynamicPoseData(self.pose_names, self.joint_names, self.imu_names, dynamic_filename)
75  # Subscribe to IMUs
76  for imu_topic in self.imu_topics:
77  rospy.Subscriber(imu_topic, Imu, self.callback)
78 
79  def callback(self, data):
80  """
81  A callback function for IMU topics
82 
83  Arguments
84  ----------
85  data: sensor_msgs.msg.Imu
86  IMU data. Please refer to the official documentation.
87  http://docs.ros.org/melodic/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/Imu.html
88  """
89  if self.watch_static_motion.is_started():
90  acceleration = utils.Vector3_to_np(data.linear_acceleration)
91  quaternion = utils.Quaternion_to_np(data.orientation)
92  joint_angles = self.controller.joint_angles
93 
94  self.static_acceleration_storage.append(
95  pose_name=self.curr_pose_name, # for each defined initial pose
96  imu_name=data.header.frame_id, # frame id of imu
97  data=np.r_[
98  quaternion,
99  acceleration,
100  joint_angles
101  ]
102  )
103 
104  if self.watch_dynamic_motion.is_started():
105  acceleration = utils.Vector3_to_np(data.linear_acceleration)
106 
107  dt = self.watch_dt.get_elapsed_time()
108  self.watch_dt.restart()
109  if self.is_sim and dt <= 0.9*self.sim_dt:
110  return
111 
112  curr_angular_velocity = self.controller.joint_velocity(self.curr_joint_name)
113  angular_acceleration = (curr_angular_velocity - self.prev_angular_velocity) / dt
114  self.prev_angular_velocity = curr_angular_velocity
115 
116  joint_angles = self.controller.joint_angles
117 
118  # time
119  t = self.watch_dynamic_motion.get_elapsed_time()
120  self.dynamic_acceleration_storage.append(
121  pose_name=self.curr_pose_name, # for each defined initial pose
122  joint_name=self.curr_joint_name, # for each excited joint
123  imu_name=data.header.frame_id, # for each imu
124  data=np.r_[
125  acceleration,
126  joint_angles,
127  t,
128  angular_acceleration,
129  AMPLITUDES[0], # Need to remove this later.
130  curr_angular_velocity,
131  ]
132  )
133 
134  def goto_defined_pose(self, pose, rest_time, log=True):
135  positions, _, pose_name = pose[0], pose[1], pose[2] # noqa: F841
136  # first, move to the position from <robot>_positions.txt
137  # TODO: We have to ensure that commanded positions are reached
138  # Then REST_TIME should start once it reached the goal.
139  self.controller.publish_positions(positions, sleep=rest_time)
140 
141  self.curr_pose_name = pose_name
142  if log:
143  print(
144  'At Position: ' + pose_name,
145  map(int, np.rad2deg(np.array(positions)))
146  )
147 
148  def record_static_motion(self, static_motion_record_time=3):
149  self.watch_static_motion.start()
150  rospy.sleep(static_motion_record_time)
151  self.watch_static_motion.stop()
152 
153  def prepare_prev_states(self, joint_name):
154  # Prepare for publishing velocities
155  self.curr_joint_name = joint_name
156  # Get current joint velocity
157  self.prev_angular_velocity = self.controller.joint_velocity(self.curr_joint_name)
158 
159  def start_watches(self, dynamic_motion_record_time):
160  # Start motion and recording
161  self.watch_dt.start()
162  self.watch_dynamic_motion.set_timer(dynamic_motion_record_time)
163  self.watch_dynamic_motion.start()
164 
165  def collect_data(self, amplitudes, freqs, rest_time,
166  static_motion_record_time,
167  dynamic_motion_record_time):
168  """
169  This will move the joint of the robot arm like a sine wave
170  for all joints for all defined poses.
171  """
172  self.controller.set_joint_position_speed(speed=1.0)
173 
174  for pose in self.poses_list:
175  self.goto_defined_pose(pose, rest_time)
176  # Record for given time
177  self.record_static_motion(static_motion_record_time)
178 
179  for i, joint_name in enumerate(self.joint_names):
180  # Go to current setting position
181  if i != 0:
182  self.goto_defined_pose(pose, rest_time, log=False)
183 
184  # Prepare for recording dynamic motion
185  self.prepare_prev_states(joint_name)
186  self.start_watches(dynamic_motion_record_time)
187 
188  velocities = np.zeros(len(self.joint_names))
189  while True:
190  # time within motion
191  t = self.watch_dynamic_motion.get_elapsed_time()
192 
193  # Oscillated Velocity pattern
194  velocities[i] = amplitudes[i] * np.sin(2 * np.pi * freqs[i] * t)
195  self.controller.send_velocities(velocities)
196 
197  if self.watch_dynamic_motion.is_ended():
198  break
199 
200  if rospy.is_shutdown():
201  return
202  self.r.sleep()
203 
204  self.watch_dynamic_motion.stop()
205  rospy.sleep(0.1)
206 
207  def save(self, save=True, verbose=False, clean_static=True, clean_dynamic=False):
208  """
209  Save data to a pickle file.
210 
211 
212  Arguments
213  ----------
214  `save`: `bool`
215  If the data will be saved
216 
217  `verbose`: `bool`
218  """
219  if clean_static:
220  static_data = self.static_acceleration_storage.clean_data(verbose)
221  else:
222  static_data = self.static_acceleration_storage.data
223 
224  if clean_dynamic:
225  dynamic_data = self.dynamic_acceleration_storage.clean_data(verbose)
226  else:
227  dynamic_data = self.dynamic_acceleration_storage.data
228 
229  if save:
230  rospy.loginfo('saving')
231  self.static_acceleration_storage.save(static_data)
232  self.dynamic_acceleration_storage.save(dynamic_data)
233 
234 
235 if __name__ == '__main__':
236  rospy.init_node('data_collection')
237 
238  controller = PandaController(is_sim=IS_SIM)
239  filename = 'panda_positions.txt'
240 
241  poses_list = utils.get_poses_list_file(filename)
242 
243  savedir = os.path.join(ROS_ROBOTIC_SKIN_PATH, 'data')
244  static_filename = 'static_data_panda.pickle'
245  dynamic_filename = 'dynamic_data_panda.pickle'
246 
247  data_collector = DataCollector(
248  controller=controller,
249  poses_list=poses_list,
250  is_sim=IS_SIM,
251  savedir=savedir,
252  static_filename=static_filename,
253  dynamic_filename=dynamic_filename
254  )
255 
256  data_collector.collect_data(
257  amplitudes=AMPLITUDES,
258  freqs=FREQS,
259  rest_time=REST_TIME,
260  static_motion_record_time=STATIC_MOTION_RECORD_TIME,
261  dynamic_motion_record_time=DYNAMIC_MOTION_RECORD_TIME
262  )
263  data_collector.save(save=True, verbose=False)
